channel.title: Hi I'm Mike and I am building a proposal app called MadProps
channel.description:
Hey everyone -
My name is Mike Hughes, I know some of you from twitter (@cityzenllc) and some of you from the ExpressionEngine community. I'm currently working on a SaaS called MadProps which is an online proposal and document building app.
I've just started letting very early beta testers in today and looking to get this thing live as soon as possible.
Looking forward to good conversations about bootstrapping, pricing, testing, etc.

item.title: Hi I'm Mike and I am building a proposal app called MadProps
item.dc:creator: ian
item.description:
Awesome Mike, great to have you on board!

Read full topic
item.source: Hi I'm Mike and I am building a proposal app called MadProps
